_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

BillOfLading.description: A document issued by the party who acts as an agent for a transportation carrier or other agents to the party who gives instructions for the transportation services (shipper, consignor, etc.) stating the details of the transportation, charges, and terms and conditions under which the transportation service is provided. The party issuing this document does not necessarily provide the physical transportation service. The information in the Bill of Lading corresponds to the information on the Forwarding Instructions. It is used for any mode of transport. A Bill of Lading can serve as a contractual document between the parties for the transportation service. The document evidences a contract of carriage by sea and the acceptance of responsibility for the goods by the carrier, by which the carrier undertakes to deliver the goods against surrender of the document. A provision in the document that the goods are to be delivered to the order of a named person, or to order, or to bearer, constitutes such an undertaking.

BillOfLading.title: Bill Of Lading. Details
BillOfLading.description: A document issued by the party who acts as an agent for a transportation carrier or other agents to the party who gives instructions for the transportation services (shipper, consignor, etc.) stating the details of the transportation, charges, and terms and conditions under which the transportation service is provided. The party issuing this document does not necessarily provide the physical transportation service. The information in the Bill of Lading corresponds to the information on the Forwarding Instructions. It is used for any mode of transport. A Bill of Lading can serve as a contractual document between the parties for the transportation service. The document evidences a contract of carriage by sea and the acceptance of responsibility for the goods by the carrier, by which the carrier undertakes to deliver the goods against surrender of the document. A provision in the document that the goods are to be delivered to the order of a named person, or to order, or to bearer, constitutes such an undertaking.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Bill Of Lading. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Bill Of Lading. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Bill Of Lading. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Bill Of Lading. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Bill Of Lading. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CarrierAssignedID.title: Bill Of Lading. Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
CarrierAssignedID.description: Reference number (such as a booking reference number) assigned by a carrier or its agent to identify a specific shipment when cargo space is reserved prior to loading.

UUID.title: Bill Of Lading. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Bill Of Lading. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Bill Of Lading. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Name.title: Bill Of Lading. Name
Name.description: Text, assigned by the sender, that identifies this document to business users.

Description.title: Bill Of Lading. Description. Text
Description.description: Textual description of the document instance.

Note.title: Bill Of Lading. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentStatusCode.title: Bill Of Lading. Document Status Code. Code
DocumentStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of the Bill Of Lading (revision, replacement, etc.).

ShippingOrderID.title: Bill Of Lading. Shipping Order Identifier. Identifier
ShippingOrderID.description: Reference number to identify a Shipping Order or Forwarding Instruction.

ToOrderIndicator.title: Bill Of Lading. To Order_ Indicator. Indicator
ToOrderIndicator.description: Indicates whether the transport document is consigned to order.

AdValoremIndicator.title: Bill Of Lading. Ad Valorem_ Indicator. Indicator
AdValoremIndicator.description: A term used in commerce in reference to certain duties, called ad valorem duties, which are levied on commodities at certain rates per centum on their value.

DeclaredCarriageValueAmount.title: Bill Of Lading. Declared Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCarriageValueAmount.description: Value declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

OtherInstruction.title: Bill Of Lading. Other_ Instruction. Text
OtherInstruction.description: Other free-text instructions to the forwarders or carriers related to the shipment. This element should only be used where such information cannot be represented in other structured information entities within the document.

ConsignorParty.title: Bill Of Lading. Consignor_ Party. Party
ConsignorParty.description: The party consigning goods as stipulated in the transport contract by the party ordering transport.

CarrierParty.title: Bill Of Lading. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: The party providing the transport of goods between named points.

FreightForwarderParty.title: Bill Of Lading. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party
FreightForwarderParty.description: A party combining individual smaller consignments into a single larger shipment (a so-called consolidated consignment or shipment) that is sent to a counterpart who mirrors the consolidator's activity by dividing the consolidated consignment into its original components.

Shipment.title: Bill Of Lading. Shipment
Shipment.description: An identifiable collection of one or more goods items to be transported between the seller party and the buyer party.

DocumentReference.title: Bill Of Lading. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

ExchangeRate.title: Bill Of Lading. Exchange Rate
ExchangeRate.description: Information that directly relates to the rate of exchange (conversion) between two currencies.

DocumentDistribution.title: Bill Of Lading. Document Distribution
DocumentDistribution.description: A list of interested parties to whom this document is distributed.

Signature.title: Bill Of Lading. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
